title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2108 - Administrative Review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2108 - Administrative Review

State Regulations
§ 2108.1 - Persons who may file protests
§ 2108.2 - Time for filing protests
§ 2108.3 - Time of filing answer to protests
§ 2108.4 - Form and content of protest against this Subchapter or portion thereof
§ 2108.5 - Form and content of protest against an order of the local rent administrator
§ 2108.6 - Service and filing of protests
§ 2108.7 - Time of filing answer to protest
§ 2108.8 - Action by administrator
§ 2108.9 - Final determination by the administrator
§ 2108.10 - Pending protests and remit proceedings
§ 2108.11 - Time within which the Administrator shall take final action
§ 2108.12 - Stays
§ 2108.13 - Judicial review
§ 2108.14 - Modification or revocation of orders on protest
§ 2108.15 - Protests against an order of the State rent administrator
§ 2108.16 - PARs; time periods, address of office of rent administration

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2108

Statutory authority: L. 1950, ch. 250, as
amd. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
